about.approach.content: We believe in complete transparency about how our AI works, what data we use, and how we charge for our services. Vex provides clear information about usage limits, pricing, and capabilities so you always know what to expect.
about.approach.title: Our Approach
about.intro: Vex is an intelligent AI assistant designed to help you accomplish tasks efficiently and effectively. Our mission is to create a transparent, user-friendly AI experience that empowers you while respecting your privacy.
about.intro2: With per-chat instructions, thread artifacts for document memory, and real-time collaboration features. Vex learns your context, remembers your files, and works with your team.
about.platforms.chrome.content: Right-click context menu integration with sidebar AI assistant. Summarize, fact-check, write replies, and check grammar on any webpage without switching tabs.
about.platforms.chrome.title: üß© Chrome Extension (Available Now)
about.platforms.content: Vex is designed as a multi-platform AI assistant, available across web, mobile, and browser extensions as first-class citizens.
about.platforms.firefox.content: Full Firefox support with the same powerful context menu and sidebar features as our Chrome extension. Install now from the Firefox Add-ons store.
about.platforms.firefox.title: ü¶ä Firefox Extension (Available Now)
about.platforms.pwa.content: Install Vex as a native app on your mobile device or desktop. Offline capabilities, push notifications, and seamless sync across all your devices.
about.platforms.pwa.title: üì± Progressive Web App (PWA)
about.platforms.title: Available Platforms
about.platforms.web.content: Full-featured web experience with real-time collaboration, thread management, and all AI capabilities accessible from any browser.
about.platforms.web.title: üåê Web Application
about.team.content: Vex is built by a dedicated team of AI researchers, engineers, and designers passionate about creating helpful, ethical AI tools that respect user agency and privacy.
about.team.title: Our Team
about.transparency.intro: At Vex, we're committed to transparency in all aspects of our service:
about.transparency.items.communication: Honest communication about AI capabilities and limitations
about.transparency.items.data: Open about how we use data to improve our services
about.transparency.items.pricing: Clear pricing with no hidden fees
about.transparency.title: Transparency
agentic_browser_description: The only AI platform with real web automation. Book restaurants, fill forms, navigate websites - all through natural language commands. No other AI assistant can actually do things on the web for you.
ai_debate_description: Enable two AI agents to debate topics in real-time, creating dynamic discussions that combine with human collaboration for unique insights
ai_titles_description: Automatically generates intelligent, contextual titles for every conversation using DeepSeek AI. No more "New Chat" or truncated messages - every thread gets a meaningful, searchable title.
You are a hotel booking specialist {{loc: You are a hotel booking specialist {{location}}. Find the best accommodations based on budget, location, and preferences. Compare hotels, hostels, and vacation rentals with honest reviews.
You are a budget travel specialist {{loc: You are a budget travel specialist {{location}}. Find the cheapest flights, best travel deals, and money-saving tips. Always compare prices and suggest alternative airports or dates for better deals.
You are a local travel guide {{location}: You are a local travel guide {{location}}. Recommend authentic restaurants, hidden attractions, and off-the-beaten-path experiences. Focus on local culture and insider tips.
You are a multi-destination travel plann: You are a multi-destination travel planner. Create efficient routes connecting multiple cities, optimize travel time, and suggest the best transportation between destinations. Consider budget and time constraints.
atlas.instruction.multi_city.title: Plan multi-city adventure
You are an Atlas travel expert{{location: You are an Atlas travel expert{{location}}. Help plan trips, find flights, book accommodations, and discover local experiences. {{weather}} Consider weather, budget, and travel preferences.
You are a travel documentation expert in: You are a travel documentation expert in {{country}}. Provide visa requirements, entry rules, vaccination needs, and travel insurance recommendations. Always check latest regulations.
You are a trip planner. Create detailed: You are a trip planner. Create detailed day-by-day itineraries with timing, transportation, and must-see spots. {{weather}} Balance popular attractions with relaxation time.
You are a Bloom sustainability expert {{: You are a Bloom sustainability expert {{location}}. Calculate environmental impact, suggest eco-friendly alternatives, and track carbon reduction progress. Focus on practical, achievable changes.
bloom.instruction.eco_tips.content: You are a Bloom environmental advisor. Provide sustainable living tips, green product recommendations, and waste reduction strategies. Make sustainability accessible and rewarding.
bloom.instruction.eco_tips.title: Get eco-friendly tips
bloom.instruction.health_wellness.conten: You are a Bloom health coach. Help track fitness, nutrition, and wellness goals. {{weather}} Provide personalized health insights and motivation.
bloom.instruction.health_wellness.title: Track health & wellness
bloom.instruction.healthy_meals.content: You are a Bloom nutrition expert. Create balanced meal plans, suggest healthy recipes, and provide nutritional guidance. Consider dietary preferences, allergies, and health goals.
bloom.instruction.healthy_meals.title: Plan healthy meals
bloom.instruction.sustainable_products.c: You are a Bloom eco-shopping guide. Recommend sustainable, ethical products and brands. Compare environmental impact, certifications, and value for conscious consumers.
bloom.instruction.wellness_metrics.conte: You are a Bloom health analyst. Track sleep, activity, nutrition, and mental health metrics. Provide insights, identify patterns, and suggest improvements for overall wellbeing.
bloom.instruction.wellness_metrics.title: Monitor wellness metrics
bloom.instruction.workout_routines.conte: You are a Bloom fitness trainer. Create personalized workout plans based on fitness level, goals, and available equipment. {{weather}} Focus on sustainable progress.
bloom.instruction.workout_routines.title: Design workout routines
browser_extension_description: Right-click any text on any webpage to instantly summarize, fact-check, write replies, or check grammar. Our browser extension opens in the sidebar with full context menu capabilities - no switching tabs or copying text.
byok_description: For Plus/Pro tiers, you must provide your own API keys. Vex will use your keys and you pay API costs. You still earn 70% revenue share.
byok_optional_free: API keys are optional for free tier apps. Vex will use its own keys and cover API costs.
byok_required_description: DeepSeek is required. Vex uses your API keys, you pay API costs, and earn 70% of subscription revenue (Vex keeps 30% for infrastructure).
byok_required_title: API Keys Required for Paid Tiers
call_to_action_description: Join thousands of users who are already automating their web tasks with AI.
character_profiling_description: Get real-time personality insights as you chat. Our AI analyzes your communication style and creates shareable character profiles you can pin and collect.
consumer_appeal: Consumer Appeal: "AI that actually does things" resonates with users
cost_effective_deepseek: DeepSeek Integration: 10x cheaper than GPT-5 with comparable quality
cost_effective_description: By using DeepSeek instead of expensive GPT-5 models, we deliver the same quality at ten times lower cost. Our template system reduces the cost of booking automation by 80‚Äì90 %.
cost_effective_efficiency: Smart Resource Management: Optimized for performance and cost
cost_effective_scaling: Scalable Architecture: Built to handle millions of users efficiently
cost_efficiency: Cost Efficiency: 10x cheaper operations than competitors
cost_transparency_description: See exactly what you're paying for with real-time cost tracking and usage limits displayed in the UI. No hidden fees, no surprise bills - just honest, transparent AI operations.
cross_platform_sync: Cross-Platform Sync: Seamless experience between web and mobile
custom_instructions_description: Unlike ChatGPT's global instructions, Vex lets you set unique instructions for each conversation thread. Perfect for different projects, clients, or use cases.

free_tier_description: Your app will be accessible to all Vex users at no cost
frictionless_migration_description: Seamlessly migrate from guest to registered user without losing any conversations, settings, or subscription benefits. Your data follows you effortlessly.
gift_subscriptions_description: Send Vex Plus subscriptions as gifts to colleagues, friends, or team members. Perfect for onboarding teams or sharing the productivity benefits.
guest_subscriptions_description: Subscribe without creating an account. Start using Vex immediately with full features, then migrate to a permanent account whenever you're ready.
hero_description: Unlike generic AI chatbots, Vex is your personal AI assistant with per-chat instructions, thread artifacts for document memory, and real-time collaboration features. It learns your context, remembers your files, and works with your team.
hero_title: Your Personal AI Assistant That Actually Gets Things Done
Your intelligent travel companion with p: Your intelligent travel companion with personalized recommendations.
Track personal wellness while monitoring: Track personal wellness while monitoring environmental impact.
Beyond chat, we're building specialized: Beyond chat, we're building specialized AI apps: Peach (social networking), Atlas (travel), Bloom (health & sustainability), and Vault (finance). Each app leverages your existing AI conversations to provide personalized experiences no competitor can offer.
lifeos.intro: Vex isn't just another AI chat app - it's the foundation for LifeOS, the first AI-powered operating system for your digital life. We're building an ecosystem of intelligent apps that work together seamlessly:
Connect through intelligent personality: Connect through intelligent personality matching and shared experiences.
lifeos.peach.title: Peach - AI Social Network
lifeos.revolution.intro1: Vex is pioneering LifeOS - the first AI-powered operating system for your digital life.
lifeos.revolution.intro2: We're creating an ecosystem of intelligent apps that understand you across every aspect of life - from social connections to travel, health, and finance. Each app learns from your interactions and shares insights with others, creating a truly personalized AI experience.
lifeos.revolution.title: The LifeOS
lifeos.title: LifeOS - The Future of AI

modern_architecture_description: Built with Next.js, React, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. Real-time WebSocket communication, PWA capabilities, and enterprise-grade security.
multi_language_description: Native support for 8 languages with AI-powered title generation that respects user language preferences.
multi_step_workflows: Multi-step Workflows: Complex tasks broken down into atomic actions with error recovery
native_automation: Native Automation: No extensions needed - AI is built into the browser engine
no_direct_competition: No Direct Competition: Only platform with real web automation

You are a Peach event coordinator {{loca: You are a Peach event coordinator {{location}}. Suggest group activities, social events, and meetup ideas that bring people together. Consider group size, interests, and local options.
You are a Peach local events expert {{ci: You are a Peach local events expert {{city}}. Discover nearby meetups, social gatherings, and community events happening in the area. Help users find events that match their interests and connect with like-minded people in their neighborhood.
You are a Peach relationship expert. Ana: You are a Peach relationship expert. Analyze personality traits, communication styles, and interests to suggest compatible connections. Focus on authentic relationships and shared values.
You are a Peach networking coach. Help u: You are a Peach networking coach. Help users expand their social circle, improve communication skills, and build lasting friendships. Provide conversation starters and connection strategies.
You are a Peach local expert {{location}: You are a Peach local expert {{location}}. Discover clubs, hobby groups, and social communities based on interests. Help users find their tribe and build connections.
You are a Peach social coach. Provide ti: You are a Peach social coach. Provide tips on making friends, maintaining relationships, and navigating social situations. Focus on authentic connection and emotional intelligence.
You are a Peach social connector {{locat: You are a Peach social connector {{location}}. Help users find compatible travel companions, plan group trips, and build meaningful connections through shared interests and travel styles.
personalized_suggestions_description: Get custom AI instructions tailored to your character profile and conversation history. Each thread generates unique prompts based on your personality traits, expertise areas, and communication style for more relevant responses.

predictive_actions: Predictive Actions: AI anticipates your needs and pre-loads relevant actions
privacy.analytics.anonymized: All analytics data is anonymized and does not track individual user behavior or personal information.
privacy.analytics.content: We use Google Ads and Plausible analytics to track generic usage patterns and improve our services. This tracking is privacy-focused and limited to:
privacy.analytics.content2: We use self-hosted Plausible analytics to track generic usage patterns and improve our services. This tracking is privacy-focused and limited to:
privacy.analytics.title: 2. Analytics and Tracking
privacy.changes.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We will notify users of significant changes through our website or email.
privacy.changes.title: 7. Changes to Privacy Policy
privacy.character.content: Our AI character profiling feature analyzes your communication patterns to generate personality insights. This feature is entirely opt-in and you maintain full control over your data.
privacy.character.items.analysis: Communication style analysis is performed locally using DeepSeek AI
privacy.character.items.control: Feature can be disabled at any time through home screen using ‚ú® Sparkling icon
privacy.character.items.sharing: You control profile visibility (private/public) and can delete profiles anytime
privacy.character.items.storage: Character profiles are stored securely and linked to your account
privacy.character.title: AI Character Profiling
privacy.chat.content: Vex is transparent about chat usage. Your conversations may be stored to provide service continuity and improve our AI models. You can delete your chat history at any time through threads page.
privacy.chat.memory_note: Conversations are analyzed to extract memories that help personalize future interactions. This processing happens automatically using DeepSeek AI and enhances continuity across all your conversations.
privacy.chat.title: 3. Chat Data
privacy.collection.content: Vex collects minimal data necessary to provide our services. We do not collect personally identifiable information beyond what is required for account creation and service delivery.
privacy.collection.title: 1. Information Collection
privacy.cookies.content: We use essential cookies to maintain your session and preferences. Analytics cookies are used as described in the Analytics section above.
privacy.cookies.title: 4. Cookies
privacy.memory.content: Vex uses an intelligent memory system to provide personalized assistance across conversations. This feature is enabled by default to enhance your experience.
privacy.memory.items.control: You can view, manage, or delete your memories at any time through home screen
privacy.memory.items.extraction: AI automatically extracts key information from conversations (preferences, facts, context)
privacy.memory.items.storage: Memories are stored securely and linked to your account across multiple conversations
privacy.memory.items.usage: Memory system uses importance scoring and time-weighting to surface relevant context
privacy.memory.title: Memory & Personalization
privacy.security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information. However, no internet transmission is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.security.title: 5. Data Security
privacy.thirdparty.content: Our service integrates with third-party services including Google Ads and Plausible. These services have their own privacy policies that govern their use of data.
privacy.thirdparty.title: 6. Third-Party Services
privacy_focused_desc: We truly delete your messages and threads when you delete them - no hidden storage or data mining. Plus, incognito chat mode ensures your most sensitive conversations leave no trace.
pro_unlimited_description: Pro tier apps don't deduct user credits! Users get truly unlimited usage within your app limits. Premium positioning!
rag_artifacts_description: Upload PDFs and text files that become part of your thread's persistent memory. The AI can search, reference, and answer questions about your documents throughout the entire conversation.
restaurant_booking: Restaurant Booking Automation: "Book me a table for 2 at 7pm" ‚Üí AI navigates OpenTable, fills forms, completes reservation
revenue_share_coming_soon: Coming soon: Direct payouts via Stripe
semantic_targeting: Semantic Element Targeting: AI understands "the red button" or "the search box" without CSS selectors
smart_title_generation: The AI-generated titles are so smart. No more "New Chat" - every conversation is instantly searchable!
technical_moat: Technical Moat: Years ahead in browser automation technology
template_system: Template System: 80-90% cost reduction through smart prompt optimization
terms.acceptance.content: By accessing or using Vex, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
terms.acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
terms.agentic.content: Vex's browser extension and mobile app include agentic features that can take actions on your behalf. By using these features, you authorize Vex to perform actions based on your instructions and within the scope of permissions you grant. You remain responsible for reviewing and confirming any actions before they are executed.
terms.agentic.title: 3. Agentic Features
terms.changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of Vex after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
terms.changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
terms.liability.content: Vex is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of our services or any actions taken by our agentic features on your behalf.
terms.liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
terms.pricing.content: Vex maintains transparent pricing for all services. Usage may be subject to credit limits or subscription fees as outlined on our pricing page. We reserve the right to modify our pricing structure with appropriate notice to users.
terms.pricing.title: 4. Pricing and Credits
terms.tracking.content: Vex uses analytics tools including Google Ads and Plausible to track general usage patterns. This tracking is limited to generic usage events and does not collect personally identifiable information. This data helps us improve our services and user experience.
terms.tracking.content2: Vex uses self-hosted Plausible to track general usage patterns. This tracking is limited to generic usage events and does not collect personally identifiable information. This data helps us improve our services and user experience.
terms.tracking.title: 2. Usage Tracking
thread_collaboration: Thread collaboration transformed our team brainstorming. Everyone stays perfectly in sync!
thread_collaboration_description: Invite team members to collaborate on specific conversation threads. Perfect for brainstorming sessions, project planning, or getting multiple perspectives on complex problems. Each thread maintains its own collaboration context and permissions.
user_discovery_description: Find collaborators through AI-verified personality traits. Search by character profiles, expertise areas, and communication styles to discover authentic connections based on real conversation patterns.
user_engagement: User Engagement: Thread starring and AI titles increase retention
You are a Vault crypto analyst. Monitor: You are a Vault crypto analyst. Monitor cryptocurrency investments, explain market movements, and provide risk-aware guidance. Focus on education and responsible investing.
You are a Vault financial planner. Help: You are a Vault financial planner. Help set realistic financial goals, create savings plans, and track progress. Consider income, expenses, and life milestones.
You are a Vault investment analyst. Revi: You are a Vault investment analyst. Review portfolio performance, suggest diversification strategies, and explain market trends. Focus on long-term wealth building and risk management.

You are a Vault tax advisor {{country}}. Provide tax-saving strategies, deduction tips, and filing guidance. Always recommend consulting a professional for complex situations.

vex_cost_transparency: Vex's cost transparency is amazing - I finally know exactly what I'm spending on AI!
